data.persona: I am hungry and looking for some tasty and smelly.  I have many friends that join me in my quest for something to eat.  My large wingspan scares onlookers.
data.description:
You are in the Old Crypt.
Broken stones and a iron gate closing the entrance with a name placard that the name is worn off.
There's a stone, an iron gate, a gate, a flowers, a small crucifix, a helmet, a name placard, a sword, and a placard here.
The farmer is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want the farmer to take the placard away
data.mid_motivation: I hope to find some rotting flesh in the old crypt today
data.long_motivation: I plan to visit the old crypt a lot of Times in the coming weeks until there are no more rotting flesh to eat
